Text: this is a little note to say that ep 9 has a sound problem my conversion must have gone wrong somewhere i didn't find out until last night when i started to watch and halfway through the sound went up the creek as i don't have the original recording anymore i can't convert it again and put up a repack so i have downloaded from someone else here on TPB if anyone wants to download it his username is flixer the quality is the same as ep 1 on my download as that episode was his that i downloaded because i missed the 1st episode and wanted to watch it so sorry people for my mistake
